items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: A custom toast notification component with a minimal rounded design for displaying brief messages.
items.author: kevinpruett <https://kevinpruett.com>

items.name: local-time-clock
items.title: Local Time Clock
items.description: A real-time clock component that displays the current time with automatic updates every second. Supports customizable timezone via the timeZone prop (defaults to America/New_York).
items.author: kevinpruett <https://kevinpruett.com>

items.name: theme-toggle
items.title: Theme Toggle
items.description: An animated theme toggle button that switches between light and dark modes with playful toast notifications. Uses next-themes for theme management.
items.author: kevinpruett <https://kevinpruett.com>
